saveDialog.title: Save Query Result
saveDialog.name: Name *
saveDialog.nameHelp: Used in filename (timestamp will be added automatically)
saveDialog.commentPlaceholder:
Enter the purpose and context of this query result
e.g., Data for analyzing new user registrations in December 2025. Only active users (del_kbn=0) are extracted.
saveDialog.formatTsvHelp: Easy to open in Excel and spreadsheets
saveDialog.formatJsonHelp: Easy to process programmatically, optimal for Cursor analysis

result.noResult: No result to save. Please execute a query first.
